section.name: Downloads
section.p:
Test release of Svarog-0.5:
one jar (everything packed in one jar, ready to run), + plugins (unzip and put in ~/signalml/plugins),
jar installer (an installer packaged as a jar file),
exe installer (an installer packaged as a Microsoft Windows executable).
Alternatively you can compile from the source in the git repository.
Instructions how to compile are on the wiki.

subsection.name: Development version
subsection.p: Svarog is built regularly from git sources. This unstable version is available through our continous integration system (jenkins).

ul.li: Latest compiled version (latest checkin on any branch): compilation results runnable one-jar version.
Laster compiled version on the master branch (more stable): compilation results runnable one-jar version.

subsection.name: Old versions
subsection.p: Previous stable versions of Svarog are available as packages in the archive.
